name: portfolio1.0
desc: This website was created to showcase my skills and projects. It was created with an intention to teach myself React and also creating CI/CD piplines using Github Actions.
summary: portfolio website hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server
deployment: The project's versioning is controlled through Github and the site is deployed using Docker and Github Actions. The site is hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server. The intention behind such a setup is to learn  DevOps practices and also to have a quick and easy way to migrate to a new server.
notableFeatures: Shell inspired design that gives users a unique and engaging experience to explore the website.
The project is hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server.
Deployed as a Docker container on the server.

name: BudgetBuddy
desc: BudgetBuddy is a very simple budget tracking application that allows users to track their income and expenses. It is built using React and the backend is a simple google sheet that is updated using google apps-script. The idea was to create a simple and easy to use budget tracking application that is free and user's data is stored in their own google sheet.
summary: budget tracking application built using React and a google sheet
notableFeatures: Free and user's data is stored in their own google sheet
Simple and easy to use interface
Open source and user can host their own instance of the application
No need to sign up or login to use the application

name: Films By Zakir
desc: Needed to create a website for my side hustle as a wedding filmmaker based out of New York City. The website serves as a portfolio for my work and also a way to showcase my work to potential clients. Additionally, users can contact me through the website to get in touch with me.
summary: Portfolio website for a wedding filmmaker based out of New York City
notableFeatures: Lightweight and fast website that is hosted on a self-managed Raspberry Pi server
Video gallery that is hosted on Youtube and embedded into the website

name: NYC Crime Visualizer
desc: This project is a comprehensive data analysis and visualization initiative developed as part of a school assignment. The primary objective was to explore and understand crime trends in New York City using publicly available data from the NYC Open Data portal.
summary: data analysis and visualization initiative developed as part of a school assignment
notableFeatures: Used publicly available data from the NYC Open Data portal
Used pandas to analyze the data
Used Folium to create the visualization

name: File Copier
desc: A school project created that takes a csv file that consits of list of file names and copies them from selected source to destination
summary: school project created that copies files from a source to a destination based on a csv file
notableFeatures: Used java to create the application
Used javax.swing to create the GUI

name: Powershell Scripts
desc: This project involves the development and deployment of a series of automation scripts tailored for Managed Service Provider (MSP) clients. These automated processes span both Azure cloud environments and on-premises server infrastructures.
notableFeatures: PowerShell scripts to automate tasks in Azure and on-premises servers
Automated business processes to save time and reduce manual errors
Utilized Microsoft Power Automate to create sophisticated automation workflows
